name: Kitty Jump! - Tap the cat! Hop it into the box!
name_original: Kitty Jump! - Tap the cat! Hop it into the box!
description:
Jumpy the Kitty is on a quest to jump higher than any cat has ever jumped! It's up to you to help him.

Aim well and launch Jumpy from box to box and compete against your friends to see who has the highest score.

What are you waiting for? Time to jump!
